definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
Asia/abbr. to 亞洲|亚洲[Ya4 zhou1]

sentences.english: Marcion came to Rome from Asia Minor.
sentences.chinese: 馬吉安從小亞細亞來到羅馬。

sentences.english: Marcion was this guy from Asia Minor,modern day Turkey, and just get used to that term.
sentences.chinese: 馬吉安來自小亞細亞，現在的土耳其，要熟悉這個詞。

sentences.english: An ancient city of northwest Asia Minor near the Dardanelles River.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊小亞細亞西北一古城，位於達達尼爾河附近。

sentences.english: The Asian Games owes its origins to small Asian multi-sport competitions.
sentences.chinese: 亞運會的起源於小亞細亞的多種運動競賽項目。

sentences.english: So they take her off, they take her around over to Asia Minor,modern day Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 把她帶走，帶到小亞細亞，現在的土耳其。

sentences.english: And he reigned in his place, and put on the crown of Asia: and brought great evils upon the land.
sentences.chinese: 篡了王位，戴上亞細亞的王冠，使當地遭受到大害。

sentences.english: “European Gottlieb” means the place of the sun set, namely the west from which the name of Asia and Europe is transferred.
sentences.chinese: 亞細亞洲和歐羅巴洲的名稱，就是由此轉化而來。

sentences.english: That put Alexander and his Macedonian Army in charge of both Greece and Asia Minor.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山大由此控制了希臘及小亞細亞。

definition: variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom)/fig. a good education program takes a long time to develop/cf. 十年樹木，百年樹人|十年树木，百年树人
